Class ConnectFour

java.lang.Object
ConnectFour
public class ConnectFour extends Object
ConnectFour This is the main controller class for the game ConnectFour
Version:
Assignment Hand-In - PE7070
Author:
Lauren Scott & Byron Glover

      col - - The column of the last move

    • getRowCount

      public int getRowCount()
      getRowCount This method returns a 2D array with all of the current moves in the game. This is a natural number.
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the game, as an int.

    • getColCount

      public int getColCount()
      getColCount This method returns a 2D array with all of the current moves in the game This is a natural number.
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the game, as an int.

    • addMove

      public boolean addMove(int col, boolean player)
      addMove This method adds a move to the game
      Parameters:
      col - - The column to move to
      player - - True if the player is allowed to move
      Returns:
      True if the move can be

    • generateComputerMove

      public void generateComputerMove()
      generateComputerMove This method generates the computer's move using a random number generator

    • clearGame

      public void clearGame()
      clearGame This method resets the move history table to clear the current values.

    • checkWin

      public String checkWin()
      checkWin This method checks whether there is a vertical or horizontal match of four slots, to determine who has won the game
      Returns:
      This value is the winner of the game, if it is null, there is no current winner.

    • checkGrid

      public String checkGrid(Slot[][] moves, String MOVETOKEN, String returnValue)
      checkGrid This method checks whether there is a vertical or horizontal match of four slots, to determine who has won the game
      Parameters:
      MOVETOKEN - - The token to check the grid for.
      returnValue - - The value to return if a match found in the grid.
      Returns:
      The value of returnValue, if a match is found. If a match is not found, this will be null.
